actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide an increased benefit for certain persons by changing the requirement that such persons have been fully insured under the Social Security Act as of December 31 of the calendar year in which they last rendered railroad related service.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide an increased benefit for certain persons by changing the requirement that such persons must have been fully insured under the Social Security Act as of December 31 of the calendar year in which they last rendered railroad-related service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide an increased benefit for certain persons by changing the requirement that such persons have been fully insured under the Social Security Act as of December 31 of the calendar year in which they last rendered railroad related service.
